title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Designing Agent-Native Dev Teams: Coding Agents in Real Workflows (DVT226)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 设计以智能体为核心的开发团队：在真实工作流中使用编码智能体 (DVT226)
abstract: The agentic shift is reshaping how teams build software—and AWS Autonomous Coding Agents are designed to help developers move faster, not work harder. These agents assist with structured tasks like scaffolding, test generation, and documentation, freeing up engineers to focus on design and intent. In this session, we’ll go beyond the launch and explore what it means to build agent-native workflows within existing teams.We’ll cover what emerging best practices look like from teams already exploring this new development paradigm. Whether you're an SDE experimenting with agents or an SDM deciding when to scale usage, this session shows you where vibe coding meets engineering velocity.
abstract_cn: 代理化转型正在重塑团队构建软件的方式——AWS自主编码代理旨在帮助开发人员更快地推进工作，而非更辛苦地工作。这些代理协助处理结构化任务，如脚手架搭建、测试生成和文档编写，让工程师能够专注于设计和意图。在本次会议中，我们将超越产品发布本身，探讨在现有团队中构建代理原生工作流的意义。我们将介绍已经探索这一新开发范式的团队所展现的新兴最佳实践。无论您是正在试验代理的软件开发工程师，还是正在决定何时扩大使用规模的软件开发经理，本次会议将向您展示氛围编码与工程速度的交汇点。
